'''2.3.481''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on November 3, 2022, released as a stable release on November 7, but it was took off from the stable release channel on November 8.

== Fixes ==
* Fix to Launcher DLL issue.
* Various bug fixes and improvements throughout the Launcher.</onlyinclude>
